page.title: Notifications
page.description: View all notifications for your user account.
page.notNotificationAvailable: You have not yet received any platform notifications.

configurationPage.title: User Notification Configuration
configurationPage.description: Manage your in-app and personal email notification settings.
configurationPage.infoAlert: Selected notifications may not arrive immediately, as we are planning a gradual rollout. No further action will be required after setting your preferences.

inApp.title: Platform Notification Preferences Configuration
inApp.description: Platform notifications will inform you about events concerning you.

enableAllNotifications.label: Enable platform notification receipt
enableAllNotifications.description: By disabling this option, you will not receive any platform notifications

email.title: Email Notification Preferences Configuration
email.description: Email notifications will inform you about events concerning you in your personal inbox. The email we will use is the one you provided during registration.
email.linkLabel: Not your email? Find out how to update it
email.digestInfoDescription: The weekly summary will be available shortly, so you will not receive communications immediately. We have registered your preference and no further action will be required.

enableAllNotifications.label: Enable email notification receipt
enableAllNotifications.description: By disabling this option, you will not receive any emails

digestSwitch.label: Receive reminders and news
digestSwitch.description: We will send you a summary once a week

customNotificationSwitch.label: Activate custom notifications
customNotificationSwitch.description: Configure for which events you want to be notified immediately

eServiceStateUpdated.label: E-service status update
eServiceStateUpdated.description: Notify me when an e-service status changes

agreementManagement.label: Service request acceptance or rejection
agreementManagement.description: Notify me when one of my service requests is accepted or rejected

agreementStateUpdated.label: Service request status update
agreementStateUpdated.description: Notify me when one of my service requests is suspended or reactivated

purposeManagement.label: Purpose acceptance or rejection
purposeManagement.description: Notify me when a purpose is accepted or rejected

purposeStateUpdated.label: Purpose status update
purposeStateUpdated.description: Notify me when a purpose status is suspended, archived, or reactivated

thresholdsExcedeed.label: Load thresholds status
thresholdsExcedeed.description: Notify me when one of my requests exceeds the maximum thresholds set by the producer

thresholsdAdjustmentRequest.label: Threshold adjustment request
thresholsdAdjustmentRequest.description: Notify me when a producer accepts or rejects a threshold adjustment request

agreementRequestReceived.label: Management of incoming service requests
agreementRequestReceived.description: Notify me about new incoming service requests and those automatically accepted

agreementStateUpdated.label: Service request status update
agreementStateUpdated.description: Notify me if a service request for one of my e-services is suspended, archived, or reactivated

purposeStateUpdated.label: Purpose status update
purposeStateUpdated.description: Notify me when a purpose linked to one of my e-services is suspended, archived, or reactivated

clientAssociationFromSubscriber.label: Client association by the consumer
clientAssociationFromSubscriber.description: Notify me when a consumer associates a client with one of my e-services

thresholdExceeded.label: Threshold exceeded
thresholdExceeded.description: Notify me when the overall load estimate I set for one of my e-services is exceeded

thresholdAdjustmentRequest.label: Threshold adjustment request
thresholdAdjustmentRequest.description: Notify me when a consumer requests a modification of the thresholds for one of my e-services

instanceFromTemplate.label: E-service instance generation from template
instanceFromTemplate.description: Notify me when an e-service instance is generated from one of my templates

templateStateUpdated.label: My template update
templateStateUpdated.description: Notify me when the status of one of my templates is modified

newTemplateVersion.label: New template version
newTemplateVersion.description: Notify me when the creator of an e-service template of my interest publishes a new version

templatePropertiesUpdated.label: Template property update
templatePropertiesUpdated.description: Notify me when the properties of a template of my interest are modified

templateStateArchivedSuspended.label: Template status update
templateStateArchivedSuspended.description: Notify me when a template of my interest is suspended, archived, or reactivated

delegationUpdated.label: Delegation acceptance status
delegationUpdated.description: Notify me when a delegation is accepted or rejected <or revoked> by the entity to whom I conferred it

eserviceDelegatedCreated.label: Delegate request approval
eserviceDelegatedCreated.description: Notify me when the delegate generates a new version of the delegated e-service so that I can evaluate it

delegationUpdated.label: Received delegation status
delegationUpdated.description: Notify me when an entity entrusts or revokes the management of an e-service to me via delegation

eserviceDelegatedApproval.label: New e-service version publication approval
eserviceDelegatedApproval.description: Notify me when the delegating entity has approved or rejected my version change request

attributesStateUpdated.label: Certified or verified attribute conferral or revocation
attributesStateUpdated.description: Notify me when a certified or verified attribute is conferred or revoked to me

clientKeysAssociationUpdated.label: Key status updates linked to a client
clientKeysAssociationUpdated.description: Notify me when the status of a key linked to a client changes or should be replaced.

outcome.error: It was not possible to update the notification preference. Please try again later.
